Attributes.description: The provision and analysis of cost accounting information that will assist management in making operating decisions and in evaluating operational performance. The utilization of statistical analysis and linear models is included.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of COMM 293, COMM 294 and one of COMM 190, COMM 290 and one of COMM 191, COMM 291.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 14:30, End Time: 16:00, Building: Henry, Room: Angus
